activities: The information Reynolds collects on its websites is primarily used to provide information about our services and products to our customers and business partners. We also collect information from individuals on our website for marketing research, to administer contests and surveys, to correspond with individuals who contact us or report a problem on one of our websites. Please defer to our website privacy policy for additional details.
